WorkItem.Description: If I see the screenshot on the home page, it seems like I can configure NTLEAS so that when I just right click on a program it'll have an option to run it with NTLEAS but I can't seem to be able to do it.
WorkItem.Summary: How can you config NTLEAS to  have an option on right click?

Comments.Message: If I see the screenshot on the home page, it seems like I can configure NTLEAS so that when I just right click on a program it'll have an option to run it with NTLEAS but I can't seem to be able to do it.
Click the arrow at the right bottom of the Ntleas Configuration.
